creditline: Gift of Eric G. Carlson in memory of Edith Garmezy
description: seated elderly woman wearing white cap, looking at books on her lap, with a cane leaning against her chair; brown and white dog seated next to woman\'s chair
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on back, in pen LRC, in brown: [Henry Monnier / 1871]
medium: Watercolor and ink with white heightening
title: Portrait of a Woman and her Dog
